title: El Jardin de la Casa Roja
description: A 100% vegetarian restaurant with vegan options. Located in the interior patio space of the Red House which is a lodging house. The patio is open air with a canopy over most of the tables and plenty of greenery. As of Spring 2015, serves lunch only and is all made-in-house from scratch. See Facebook page for the day's menu. Call with your order and to make reservations. There is no sign out front; just ring the bell for entry.
streetAddress: Calle General Pedro Silva 699, Miraflores District
